cn.jpush.im.android.bolts

类 AndroidExecutors

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.jpush.im.android.bolts.AndroidExecutors

  • public final class AndroidExecutors
extends java.lang.Object
    This was created because the helper methods in Executors do not work as people would normally expect. Normally, you would think that a cached thread pool would create new threads when necessary, queue them when the pool is full, and kill threads when they've been inactive for a certain period of time. This is not how Executors.newCachedThreadPool() works. Instead, Executors.newCachedThreadPool() executes all tasks on a new or cached thread immediately because corePoolSize is 0, SynchronousQueue is a queue with size 0 and maxPoolSize is Integer.MAX_VALUE. This is dangerous because it can create an unchecked amount of threads.

    • 方法详细资料

      • newCachedThreadPool

        public static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService newCachedThreadPool()
        Creates a proper Cached Thread Pool. Tasks will reuse cached threads if available or create new threads until the core pool is full. tasks will then be queued. If an task cannot be queued, a new thread will be created unless this would exceed max pool size, then the task will be rejected. Threads will time out after 1 second. Core thread timeout is only available on android-9+.
        返回:
        the newly created thread pool

      • newCachedThreadPool

        public static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService newCachedThreadPool(java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory threadFactory)
        Creates a proper Cached Thread Pool. Tasks will reuse cached threads if available or create new threads until the core pool is full. tasks will then be queued. If an task cannot be queued, a new thread will be created unless this would exceed max pool size, then the task will be rejected. Threads will time out after 1 second. Core thread timeout is only available on android-9+.
        参数:
        threadFactory - the factory to use when creating new threads
        返回:
        the newly created thread pool

      • allowCoreThreadTimeout

        public static void allowCoreThreadTimeout(java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor executor,
                          boolean value)
        Compatibility helper function for ThreadPoolExecutor.allowCoreThreadTimeOut(boolean) Only available on android-9+.
        参数:
        executor - the ThreadPoolExecutor
        value - true if should time out, else false

      • uiThread

        public static java.util.concurrent.Executor uiThread()
        An Executor that executes tasks on the UI thread.
